modeHelper.include: Select this if the input amount already includes tax.

explanation.title: Understanding the Results
explanation.grossProfitDesc: The absolute amount of money you make (Revenue - Cost).
explanation.marginDesc: The percentage of revenue that is profit. A higher margin is better.
explanation.markupDesc: The percentage you add to the cost to get the selling price.

sales-script.title: Sales Script Generator
sales-script.desc: Generate persuasive sales scripts instantly based on frameworks.

page.empty_state: Fill in the details and click Generate to create your sales script

cold_call.name: Cold Call
cold_call.desc: Standard outreach script for new prospects
cold_call.template:
Hi [Prospect Name], this is [Your Name] with {{productName}}.

I'm calling because we help {{targetAudience}} who are frustrated with {{painPoint}}.

We've developed a way to {{benefit}}, and I'd love to share how it works.

Do you have 30 seconds for me to tell you what we do?

gatekeeper.name: Gatekeeper
gatekeeper.desc: Getting past the receptionist or assistant
gatekeeper.template:
Hi, my name is [Your Name] calling from {{productName}}.

I'm looking to speak with the person who handles {{painPoint}} for the company.

Could you point me in the right direction?

(If asked what it's about):
It's about how we help {{targetAudience}} achieve {{benefit}} without the usual headaches. Using our {{productName}} solution.

objection.name: Objection Handling
objection.desc: Responses to 'I\'m not interested' or 'Send me info'
objection.template:
(prospect says "I'm not interested")

I completely understand. A lot of {{targetAudience}} say that initially because they're used to dealing with {{painPoint}} and don't think there's a better way.

But once they see how {{productName}} allows them to {{benefit}}, they usually wish they'd had a conversation sooner.

Value Proposition:
What if I could show you a 5-minute overview of how we solve {{painPoint}}? Would you be open to that next Tuesday?

spin.name: SPIN Selling
spin.template:
SITUATION:
"Can you tell me a bit about your current process for handling {{painPoint}}?"
"How are you currently managing expectations for your {{targetAudience}}?"

PROBLEM:
"Do you find that {{painPoint}} is taking up more time/resources than you'd like?"
"Is it difficult to achieve {{benefit}} with your current setup?"

IMPLICATION:
"If {{painPoint}} continues, how will that impact your quarterly goals?"
"Does failing to {{benefit}} affect your team's morale or productivity?"

NEED-PAYOFF:
"If you could fix {{painPoint}} and immediately start to {{benefit}}, how would that help you?"
"Would it be valuable if {{productName}} could automate this for you?"

aida.name: AIDA Framework
aida.template:
ATTENTION:
"Did you know that many {{targetAudience}} are losing hours every week due to {{painPoint}}?"

INTEREST:
"{{productName}} is a new solution designed specifically to eliminate {{painPoint}} forever.

DESIRE:
"Imagine being able to {{benefit}} without any extra effort. Our clients are seeing results in just a few days."

ACTION:
"I'd love to give you a quick demo. Are you free tomorrow morning or Thursday afternoon?"

quick_intro.title: The "Quick Question" Intro
quick_intro.subject: Quick question about [Company]
quick_intro.body:
Hi [First Name],

I was looking at [Company] and was impressed by [Achievement/Observation].

I'm writing because we help companies like yours [Benefit/Result] by [Method].

I'd love to share how we could help [Company] achieve similar results. Do you have 10 minutes next week for a brief chat?

Best,
[Your Name]

pain_point.title: Solving a Specific Pain Point
pain_point.subject: Idea for [Pain Point]
pain_point.body:
Hi [First Name],

I noticed that [Company] might be facing challenges with [Pain Point]. I've seen many companies in [Industry] struggle with this, often leading to [Negative Consequence].

We've developed a solution that [Solution Description], which has helped our clients reduce [Pain Point] by [Percentage]%.

Are you open to a quick conversation to see if this could work for you?

Cheers,
[Your Name]

followup_generic.title: Generic Follow-up
followup_generic.subject: Following up on my last email
followup_generic.body:
Hi [First Name],

I wanted to quickly follow up on my previous email. I know things get busy, so I'll keep this brief.

I'm still very interested in discussing how we can help [Company] with [Benefit].

Do you have any time later this week or early next week to connect?

Best regards,
[Your Name]

thoughts_followup.title: The "Any Thoughts?" Follow-up
thoughts_followup.subject: Any thoughts?
thoughts_followup.body:
Hi [First Name],

I'm writing to ask if you've had a chance to think about my previous note.

If you're not the right person to speak with, could you point me in the right direction?

Thanks,
[Your Name]

breakup.title: Re-engagement / Break-up
breakup.subject: Should I stay or should I go?
breakup.body:
Hi [First Name],

I haven't heard back from you, so I assume this isn't a priority right now or you've found another solution.

I'll stop following up for now to avoid cluttering your inbox.

If you ever need help with [Benefit] in the future, feel free to reach out.

Best wishes,
[Your Name]

referral.title: Referral Request
referral.subject: Who handles [Department] at [Company]?
referral.body:
Hi [First Name],

I'm looked to get in touch with the person responsible for [Department/Function] at [Company].

Could you please point me in the right direction?

Thanks in advance,
[Your Name]

news.title: Congratulations on News
news.subject: Congrats on [News/Event]
news.body:
Hi [First Name],

I saw the news about [News/Event] - congratulations! It's great to see [Company] doing so well.

I was thinking that with this growth, you might be looking for ways to [Benefit related to your product].

We've helped similar companies scale by [Value Proposition].

Would you be open to a quick chat?

Best,
[Your Name]

resource.title: Resource/Value Add
resource.subject: A resource for [Company]
resource.body:
Hi [First Name],

I found this article/resource about [Topic] and thought it might be relevant to what you're doing at [Company].

[Link to Resource]

We also specialize in this area and have some other insights that might be useful.

Let me know if you'd like to hear more.

Best,
[Your Name]

form.title: Add New Account
form.base32Note: Base32 secret provided by the service.
form.privacy: Privacy Note: Your secret keys are stored only in your browser's local storage and are never sent to any server.

errors.invalidSecret: Invalid Secret Key. Base32 keys only contain letters A-Z and numbers 2-7.

list.emptyDesc: Add an account using your secret key to start generating codes.
list.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this account?

password-gen.title: Password Generator
password-gen.desc: Create secure, random passwords using cryptographic randomness.

password-strength.title: Password Strength Checker
password-strength.desc: Analyze your password's resistance to hacking attempts.

analysis.onlineScenario: Scenario: Attacker guessing via a login form (throttled).
analysis.offlineScenario: Scenario: Attacker has your database hash and a GPU farm.
analysis.excellentDesc: No common patterns found. This password is cryptographically strong.
analysis.generic: Consider adding more random words or characters to increase entropy.

empty.title: Enter a password to see its analysis.
empty.subtitle: All checking is done locally in your browser. No data is sent anywhere.

fake-identity.title: Fake Identity Generator
fake-identity.desc: Generate random profiles for software testing and privacy.

usage.title: Usage Note
usage.text: These identities are completely fictional and generated algorithmically. Do not use for illegal activities.

temp-email.title: Disposable Email Linker
temp-email.desc: Quick links to top temporary email services for privacy.

temp-mail.desc: Most popular temporary email service. Simple and fast.

10-min.desc: Classic disposable email. Gives you 10 minutes, extendable.

emailondeck.desc: Secure and private. Good for strict spam filters.

maildrop.desc: Open inbox system. Great for quick signups.

burner.desc: Forward emails to your real inbox privately.

warnings.title: Important Warnings
list: Do not use these emails for banking, government services, or sensitive accounts.
Anyone who guesses the address (for open inboxes) can read your emails.
Once expired, you cannot recover the emails or the address.

info.title: Why use disposable email?
info.p1: When you sign up for a service just to test it or get a freebie, they often sell your email or spam you.
info.p2: Using a disposable address keeps your real inbox clean and protects your identity.

secret-note.title: Secret Note
secret-note.desc: Create encrypted notes that self-destruct after being read.

form.encryptedPlaceholder: Paste the encrypted text string here...

messages.errorInput: Please enter both a message and a password.
messages.errorDecryptInput: Please enter the encrypted text and password.
messages.errorDecrypt: Decryption failed. Wrong password or corrupted data.

ip-checker.title: IP Address Checker
ip-checker.desc: Find your public IP address and approximate location.

results.map: View Exact Location on Google Maps

accuracy.title: Location Not Accurate?
accuracy.text: IP-based location is an estimate. It often points to your Internet Provider's (ISP) data center, which can be in a different city or 50+ miles away from your actual home.
accuracy.note: This is normal for all IP tools.

browser-fingerprint.title: Browser Fingerprint
browser-fingerprint.desc: See what information your browser reveals to websites.

canvas.title: Your Canvas Fingerprint ID
canvas.desc: This ID is generated by asking your browser to draw an invisible image. Because every device renders graphics slightly differently (due to drivers, GPU, etc.), this ID can uniquely identify you across different websites even without cookies.

dns-lookup.title: DNS Lookup
dns-lookup.desc: Find DNS records for any domain name quickly.

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.text: This tool queries Google's Public DNS (8.8.8.8) directly via HTTPS to fetch the authoritative records for the domain.

results.empty: Enter a domain and select a record type to start.
results.title: Results for {{domain}}
results.noRecordsDesc: No {{type}} records were returned for this domain.

digicert.name: DigiCert SSL Helper
digicert.desc: Checks for common installation issues and intermediate chain validity.

crtsh.name: crt.sh (Log Search)

whynopadlock.name: Why No Padlock?
whynopadlock.desc: Identify mixed content errors (http resources on https pages).

sslshopper.name: SSL Shopper

errors.noIp: Could not find an IP address for this domain.

results.noPorts: No common open ports found. This is good!

steps.twoRoots: > 0, so there are two distinct real roots.
steps.oneRoot: = 0, so there is exactly one real root.
steps.complexRoots: < 0, so there are two complex roots.

errors.linearA: Coefficient "a" cannot be zero for a linear equation.
errors.quadraticA: Coefficient "a" cannot be zero for a quadratic equation. Switch to Linear.

results.howToCheck: How to check: We've isolated {{count}} key phrases. Click "Search Match" to see if these exact sentences appear elsewhere on the internet.
results.noPhrases: No long phrases detected to check. Text might be too short or fragmented.

sorting-visualizer.title: Sorting Visualizer
sorting-visualizer.desc: Visualise sorting algorithms step-by-step with code and variable updates.

bubble.name: Bubble Sort
bubble.desc: Repeatedly steps through the list, compares adjacent elements and swaps them if they are in the wrong order.

selection.name: Selection Sort
selection.desc: Repeatedly finds the minimum element from the unsorted part and puts it at the beginning.

insertion.name: Insertion Sort
insertion.desc: Builds the final sorted array one item at a time.

merge.name: Merge Sort
merge.desc: Divides the array into halves, sorts them and merges them back together.

quick.name: Quick Sort
quick.desc: Picks a pivot and partitions the array around it.

prompts: What is one small win you had today?

What gave you energy today? What drained it?
What is a new habit you want to start?
If you could relive one moment from today, what would it be?

labels.aboutDesc: Base64 is a group of binary-to-text encoding schemes that represent binary data in an ASCII string format. It is commonly used when there is a need to encode binary data that needs to be stored and transferred over media that are designed to deal with textual data.

hash-gen.title: MD5/SHA256 Hasher

html-enc.title: HTML Entity Encoder & Decoder
html-enc.desc: Convert characters to HTML entities and vice-versa for secure web development.
html-enc.subtitle: Escape or unescape HTML tags and special characters.

labels.aboutDesc: HTML encoding is crucial for preventing XSS (Cross-Site Scripting) attacks by converting special characters like < and > into their entity equivalents. This ensures the browser treats them as text rather than active code.

json-fmt.title: JSON Formatter
json-fmt.desc: Clean and validate your JSON data instantly.
json-fmt.subtitle: Clean and validate your JSON data instantly.

regex-tester.title: Regex Tester
regex-tester.desc: Test and debug your JavaScript regular expressions with real-time highlighting and match grouping.
regex-tester.subtitle: Real-time regular expression debugger.

placeholders.testString: Enter text to test your regex against...

sql-fmt.title: SQL Formatter
sql-fmt.desc: Beautify and format your SQL queries instantly.
sql-fmt.subtitle: Beautify and format your SQL queries instantly.

url-enc.title: URL Encoder & Decoder
url-enc.desc: Properly encode or decode URLs for web compatibility instantly.
url-enc.subtitle: Safe URL formatting for web developers.

labels.tipDesc: URL encoding converts characters into a format that can be transmitted over the Internet. Characters like space, ampersand, and question marks have special meanings and need to be encoded if they are part of a query string parameter.

placeholders.encode: Type or paste URL to encode...

uuid-gen.title: UUID Generator
uuid-gen.desc: Generate unique identifiers (UUID v4) for your applications.
uuid-gen.subtitle: Generate random UUID v4 identifiers.

aspect-calc.title: Aspect Ratio Calculator
aspect-calc.desc: Calculate dimensions and ratios for images, video, and design layouts.
aspect-calc.subtitle: Calculate dimensions and ratios for various displays.

contrast-check.title: Contrast Ratio Checker
contrast-check.desc: Ensure your design is accessible with our WCAG AA/AAA contrast checker.
contrast-check.subtitle: Check WCAG compliance for text accessibility.

suggestions.fail: Try increasing the contrast by using a darker background or lighter text.
suggestions.pass: Great contrast! Your text is accessible.

preview.heading: Designed for Everyone.
preview.desc: Good contrast ensures that your content is readable by everyone, regardless of their visual capabilities.
preview.small: This is a sample of small text (12px).

favicon-gen.title: Favicon Generator
favicon-gen.desc: Create professional favicons from text, emoji, or images instantly.
favicon-gen.subtitle: Generate icons for all platforms and browsers.

font-pairer.title: Font Pairing Suggestions
font-pairer.desc: Find the perfect Google Font combinations for your next project.
font-pairer.subtitle: Curated Google Font combinations.

previewText.heading: The Quick Brown Fox Jumps Over The Lazy Dog.
previewText.body: Typography is the art and technique of arranging type to make written language legible, readable, and appealing when displayed. The arrangement of type involves selecting typefaces, point sizes, line lengths, line-spacing, and letter-spacing, and adjusting the space between pairs of letters.

gradient-maker.title: CSS Gradient Maker
gradient-maker.desc: Design beautiful linear, radial, and conic gradients with our visual CSS generator.
gradient-maker.subtitle: Create complex gradients visually and export CSS.

icon-viewer.title: SVG Icon Viewer & Editor
icon-viewer.desc: View, edit colors, and optimize SVG icons directly in the browser.
icon-viewer.subtitle: Inspect, recolor, and optimize SVG files.

labels.placeholder: Upload an SVG to start editing

image-filters.title: Image Filters & Effects
image-filters.desc: Apply professional filters and effects to your photos instantly.
image-filters.subtitle: Enhance your photos with CSS-powered filters.

palette-gen.title: Color Palette Generator
palette-gen.desc: Create beautiful, harmonious color schemes for your projects.
palette-gen.subtitle: Create harmonious color schemes based on color theory.

pixel-rem.title: Pixel to REM Converter
pixel-rem.desc: Convert pixels to REM units for responsive web design.
pixel-rem.subtitle: Convert pixels to REM for modern responsive CSS.

labels.baseSizeHelp: Default browser font size is usually 16px.
labels.result: Based on a root font-size of {{baseSize}}px.

shadow-maker.title: CSS Shadow Maker
shadow-maker.desc: Create complex, layered box-shadows visually and export CSS instantly.
shadow-maker.subtitle: Design realistic shadows with multiple layers.

svg-placeholder.title: SVG Placeholder Generator
svg-placeholder.desc: Generate custom SVG placeholder images for your prototypes.
svg-placeholder.subtitle: Create lightweight SVG placeholders for layouts.

webp-conv.title: Image to WebP Converter
webp-conv.desc: Convert JPG and PNG images to high-performance WebP format instantly in your browser.
webp-conv.subtitle: Convert your images to high-performance WebP format.
